select count(*) from reply where REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' and board_no = 2 and content_no = #{crNo}

select REPLY_NO , nickname , board_no , content_no , reply_content , to_char(reply_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reply_date , reply_status from reply join member using (mno) where reply_status = 'Y' and content_no = #{crNo} order by reply_no desc
